They would have to adjust the materials they use to make clothing and footwear to prevent aerodynamic issues during flight.
Humans with wings would have a different sense of balance and spatial awareness as they would have to adjust their vision and movements to accommodate their new flight capabilities.
They would be able to explore new areas that are currently difficult or dangerous to reach, such as high-altitude peaks, cliffs, and steep cliffsides.
They would also have a new way to travel as they could soar over landscapes and cities at high speeds, providing a completely different perspective of the world.
A new form of air traffic control would be necessary to manage the increased number of flyers in the sky.
